sentences.en: It has lived because readers appreciate a refreshing stimulus, an irreverent reminder that they live in a world of platitudinous thinking, cheap moralizing, and foolish philosophy.
sentences.cn: 它的存在是因为读者欣赏使人耳目一新的刺激，毫不客气地提醒他们活在一个思相陈腐、道德低廉、哲学荒谬的世界里。

sentences.en: The whole speech was platitudinous nonsense.

sentences.en: What troubles me most about this is not the workshop or platitudinous questionnaire the DNA bit.
sentences.cn: 我最感到苦恼的还不是研讨班,也不是这种陈腐的问卷调查,而是机构DNA这码事.
